title: BarkMatch
description: Animal shelters are able to set up a profile and add dogs to be walked by a volunteer. A volunteer is able to see the dogalog, filter and sign up to walk a specific dog then receive an e-mail confirmation.

title: SearchU
description: Prospective student is able to search for an institution and obtain information on institution and a quality of life index in location searched, if available.

title: Employee Directory
description: Incorporating ReactJS, this application allows a user to sort and filter through an employee directory to find a target employee's information.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: This fitness tracker application allows for a user to keep their  workouts stored all in one place. A user can start a workout and input the different details of their workout and save it for future reference.

title: Budget Tracker
description: This budget tracker application allows a user to input details of their finances, whether they want to add funds or subtract funds. This application also works offline.

title: Eat-da-Burger
description: Application to create a burger that will be displayed on the left hand side of the screen, then devour it, which will then be displayed to the right hand side of the screen.
